Segment.name: CRI
Segment.comment: To specify information about the claim being reported

Field.name: MaintenanceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the specific type of item maintenance

Field.name: ClaimStatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of an entire claim as assigned by the payor, claim review organization or repricing organization

Field.name: MaintenanceReasonCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the reason for the maintenance change

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: FrequencyCode
Field.comment: Code indicating frequency or type of activities or actions being reported

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: AdjustmentReasonCodeCharacteristic
Field.comment: Specifies an additional characteristic of the adjustment reason
